texts.name: Elfaba
texts.biography: {West Evil Witch} came to Enroth, to enslave the whole land. Dark, gloomy Ravens always stand by her side scaring and frightening people. Elfaba likes to breath swampy odour, so she decides to stay with Gorgons. No one knows hot to stop this mortal beauty.

specialty.description:
{Wicked Witches}

Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Wicked Witches for each level attained after 4th level.
specialty.name: Wicked Witches
